mine.question: Can a stone pickaxe be used to mine diamonds in Minecraft?
mine.answer: No, a stone pickaxe cannot be used to mine diamonds. If you attempt to mine diamond ore with a stone pickaxe, the block will break, but it will not drop any diamonds. You need to use an iron pickaxe or a better one (such as a diamond or netherite pickaxe) to successfully mine and collect diamonds.
